QuestData.Title: Lord Marrowgar Must Die!
QuestData.Description: Lord Marrowgar is the guardian of the Frozen Throne within the Spire Chamber. Pieced together by the Lich King from the bones of a thousand vanquished adventurers, Marrowgar wields the power of the throne itself.$B$BWithout the destruction of this bone wraith, there is no hope of taking Icecrown Citadel.$B$BThe Council of Six has decreed that Lord Marrowgar must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Lord Marrowgar.$B$BThis quest can be completed with any difficulty or size raid.
QuestData.RewardText: The Frozen Throne is without its chief guardian thanks to you. Our attacks upon the Lich King's forces will be all the more successful now.
